description: Whether you're a gram-counting thru-hiker, a kitchen-sink backpacker, or a passionate dayhiker, the Trail Sender™ Pant is light, comfortable, and durable enough for any trail traveler. Our lightest trail pant that combines an athletic design with classic ripstop fabric, the Trail Sender also features plenty of pocket storage and an adjustable waist with internal drawcord for the perfect fit.
name: Mountain Hardwear Trail Sender Pants, Reg - Mens
